title: Kimono, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed with a stencil on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
description: All over middle grey tone created by a tiny dot pattern created by a resist supplied through a stencil. Fabric dyed dark blue. A crest appears on each shoulder on the front and center of shoulders at back. Kimono is unlined and the fabric is double faced.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product

tombstone.epitaph:
Kimono, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed with a stencil on plain weave. Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund. 1975-82-5.
